query:
SELECT 
  t.id,
  t.name,
  t.assignedTo,
  (
    SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(m.memberName SEPARATOR ', ')
    FROM household_members m
    WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(t.assignedTo, CAST(m.id AS JSON))
  ) as assignedToNames
FROM tasks t
WHERE t.assignedTo IS NOT NULL
LIMIT 5;
